ongoing.name: Mobius
ongoing.p1: Mobius closes the gap between the internet world and blockchain world through innovative and simple protocols that introduce new standards for cross-blockchain login, payment, governance, and oracles.
ongoing.p1_cn: Mobius是一个跨链支付解决方案。包括一套跨链通用协议API和DApp Store。
ongoing.p2: The public sale start on Jan 18, 2018.

ongoing.name: U919
ongoing.p1: Bring the traditional wine culture to the blockchain.
ongoing.p1_cn: 用最先进的技术承载最传统的文化。Ultiledger纪念酒让传统酱香酒在链上流转。
ongoing.p2: Let the wine that is more fragrant and fragrant can be circulated.

ongoing.name: Repo Coin
ongoing.p1: Bringing the $1 billion auto repossession industry onto the blockchain.
ongoing.p1_cn: 将10亿美元的汽车行业带到区块链中。
ongoing.p2_cn: 让汽车回收变得更加容易。

ongoing.name: CryptoTARI
ongoing.p1: CryptoTARI is a pre-mined cryptocurrency which can also be released into circulation through charitable donations.
ongoing.p1_cn: CryptoTARI是一种预分配的币，用来做慈善。
ongoing.p2: It is a cryptocurrency that devotes a helping hand to those in need.
ongoing.p2_cn: 它是用来帮助他人的加密货币。

ongoing.name: Dried Fish
ongoing.p1: XYG was originally designed to encourage developers to integrate blockchain technology with existing legacy application products and development processes.
ongoing.p1_cn: 小鱼干用于鼓励开发者将区块链技术与现有的传统应用产品以及开发过程进行融合。
ongoing.p2: The public sale start on Jun 1, 2018.

ongoing.name: SureRemit
ongoing.p1: The SureRemit token (RMT) is an utility token built on the Stellar Network, designed to be used by immigrants and customers within the SureRemit platform.
ongoing.p1_cn: RMT是基于恒星的用于支付的数字凭证。旨在供WureRemit平台内的移民和客户使用。
ongoing.p2: Total Token Supply: One Billion RMT Tokens, One $RMT = $0.02

ongoing.name: Smartlands
ongoing.p1: Smartlands platform is designed to create a new class of low-risk future-proof tokens, secured by real, profitable assets in agriculture.
ongoing.p1_cn: Smartlands平台计划做一个低成本的长期的农业代币，具体介绍看他们网站。
ongoing.p2: Total supply 100,000,000 SLT. ICO last 15 days.
